overview: Bellator LXXX took place on November 9, 2012 at the Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino in Hollywood, Florida. The event was distributed live in prime time by MTV2.  Bellator 80 hosted the second half of the semi-finals of Bellator's Season Seven Heavyweight Tournament and Featherweight Tournament.  The featherweight bout between Sky Moiseichik and Shanon Slack was changed to a 150-lbs catchweight bout after both fighters failed to make weight.
title: Bellator 80
